Hi Albert!

Just wanted to follow up about connecting with Henrik. Given your deep experience in software development and AI, particularly with Python and modern frameworks, and Henrik's hands-on work with AI at Neumann Technology Platform using Python and Hugging Face's transformers, I think you'd have an amazing technical discussion about implementing AI solutions.

Plus, with your background in medical research institutions and Henrik's interest in healthcare innovation, you both bring unique perspectives on how technology can transform the healthcare space. I really think you could explore some exciting collaborative possibilities.

You can respond simply with a **'yes' or 'no'**, and I can follow up with Henrik. Again, no worries if it's not a fit right now.

If you're looking for another match, or just want to catch up, you can call me at any time at +14159699735. Looking forward to hearing from you!

Cheers,
Boardy

P.S. Just so you know that if I don't hear back from you one way or another, I'll eventually assume that you are no longer interested in receiving introductions from me.
